name: Cozumel Scuba Diving
description: You've doubtless heard about the legendary visibility and water clarity that exists around Cozumel island, as well as some of the world's best coral reefs.  No need to miss out because you're staying in Playa del Carmen!  Cozumel is just a 40 minute ferry ride away.  These trips will open you up to the wonders of Cozumel scuba diving.
